name: Fragon
description:
CONTROLS:

Left / Right Arrows -> Move

Space / Click Fragon -> Shoot

-----------------------------------

Fragon is a game inspired by the old "Bow and Arrow" game for windows, but imagined for mobile devices. 

We worked on this for a short time back in 2015,  but we ended up leaving it aside to work on other stuff and never got back to it. I really like the design of the character, and we had  some cool ideas for enemies and mechanics, the main reason for not getting back to it is that I got  tired  of mobile games and free-to-play mechanics. But we do intend to come back to it at some point!

For more info, check our Blog, or follow me on twitter to keep in touch!
